website_summaries.verdict: Exceptional picture resolution, even with non-4K signal input. Built-in Roku system reduces the need for additional signal options. Download the Roku app for better remote experience.
pros: 4K display at a standard LED price point
Can keep track of four separate users
cons: Included Roku device has no web browsing capability

customer_reviews.title: Was Concerned At First
customer_reviews.text: When I initially turned the TV on I was not happy with the picture quality at all. I'm not sure if the screen needed to warm up or have a break in type of period but the picture improved overwhelmingly throughout the first night of use. Overall I'm very happy with the picture quality and TV overall. It was odd that I needed to have an internet connection in order to get started (setup) and actually begin using the TV. I see how that could be an issue for someone. I guess that's what you get for buying a "smart" TV.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Pincher

customer_reviews.title: good tv. warranty expired a few days after 90 days and no help from customer service
customer_reviews.text: purchased tv in may, delivered in june. good picture and quality nice size. however around the expiry of the warranty from the seller, i have a blue line from top to bottom. no help whatsoever. pretty dissapointed. i guess thats the risk of a refurbished product. wont be buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: David maddux

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Like this bargain, came in looking like new. Setup was very simple and image outstanding.. Warranty is just for 90 days as refurbished, but nothing is indicating it won't last years. I can't ask more for 55"' TV for less than $300. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: bissi

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Have a lot of reboot issues, freezing up, shutting down. But overall, it has done the job needed. I have gotten good use out of it. Had it over 2 yrs now . So it has paid for itself . If it wasn't for the constant glitch issues I would be 100% content. But, considering the small price I paid for it, I really can't complain at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie inlow

customer_reviews.title: The quality of picture is great
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about my new TCL 55 inch 4k UHD TV.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Nealy-Wright

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good tv, not great. A good value at this price. Picture quality is good , the Roku is a bit cumbersome, but you get used to it quickly. If you are looking for a decent tv at a good price, this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Yost

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price doesn’t get better than this
customer_reviews.text: Great TV for the price doesn’t get better than this !
customer_reviews.author: lane

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Arrived a day later than expected but was in no real hurry, TV was in new condition with a great picture and all of the apps as advertised.. I saved a good bit of money buying it through Amazon.. over all I'm satisfied..
customer_reviews.author: brian lee

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality doesn’t last 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had this NEW TV not quite 3 months and the picture started getting dark on left hand side of tv and has vertical lines up & down left side as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Collins

customer_reviews.title: Love this tv!
customer_reviews.text: We bought two tcl’s, one from amazon and one from Walmart. Incredibly happy with both! They’ve held up without issue for 8 months now. Great 4K tv for the price and RoKu is a big plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bagels

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup, remote works great, will get another bigger one, can't wait for the updated display
customer_reviews.author: John P. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Dead on Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Received the TV and it looks like the screen was hit with a hammer. I will be contacting the seller to try to get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tv
customer_reviews.text: Had this TV for over a year and it is the best tv I've had great picture sound etc.
customer_reviews.author: Luis R.

customer_reviews.title: Would be best to go to Wal-Mart!
customer_reviews.text: Opened the tv box and first of all smelt a burnt plastic odor.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Had product for 2 months.... TV ...
customer_reviews.text: Had product for 2 months....TV died 1 week ago....still trying to get TCL call center to respond.....Very Frustrated......Do Not Buy This Product!!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew G Knezich

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived a few days late but I love it
customer_reviews.author: Rosetta Williams

customer_reviews.title: PREVIOUS RATING CORRECTION. 5 STAR ALL THE WAY
customer_reviews.text: It appears that I may have given a wrong rating mostly because I did not find the Remote, stands and Power cord which was tapped firmly to the packaging box. I went and looked again after the response from seller and was able to find it. the TV works just perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin Okundaye

customer_reviews.title: Like new, well packed and everything as described
customer_reviews.text: Like new, well packed and everything as described. Wish I had known such a bulky item required Pilot and another shipping carrier. After paying for 2 day shipping and waiting 5 days. Other than that A+ Thanks. Would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: 5Alive

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding TV! Amazing value!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so I bought mine new at Walmart months ago but I had to add a review, for the beautiful screen and little price that I paid it has been an absolute steal I couldn't be happier, feel like tcl got the short end of the stick here amazing tv for an amazing price in an vast understatement 5 stars all the way!
customer_reviews.author: Tony B the TECH tiger

customer_reviews.title: Died in just over a year
customer_reviews.text: Great low cost 4k hdr tv. Built in 4k Roku. Died in a little over a year because the LEDs went out. This is a common problem all over the internet.
customer_reviews.author: P. Reid

customer_reviews.title: Looks brand new
customer_reviews.text: Looks brand new even down to the packaging everything was wrapped nice and plastic covered the TV so it would have stratches I bought mine refurbished hope it last but overall good product and price
customer_reviews.author: Honey Mocha

customer_reviews.title: Good for year ONLY!!!
customer_reviews.text: This TV is trash. I bought it new a little over a year ago, didn't purchase the additional year of warranty offered through the store thinking the TV would at least last 3-5 years. Not this one. If you buy a nock off TCL brand you will have to make TV purchase every year or so. Customer service would not help any. Definitely wish I would have spent extra and got name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for me,  unbelievable price
customer_reviews.text: Have ad for about a year, great quality, the integrated Roku is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: 1kenthomas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cheep 4k t.v.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal refurbished sound is bad but pretty much all r.v.s are now days and verry good interface
customer_reviews.author: Aaron cowley

customer_reviews.title: Great TV!
customer_reviews.text: We put this in our bedroom. We love it. Perfect size for distance. Medium size room. Queen size bed. Great picture, great extras like PIP, great TV!
customer_reviews.author: Princess Consuela Bananahammock

customer_reviews.title: Pos tv
customer_reviews.text: Tv stopped working 1yr after buying looked it up I'm not the only one that had same problem say that the screen will fail and tcl only has a 1yr manufacture warranty the black light led strip constantly shorts out the t con borde
customer_reviews.author: shanda t.

product_meta.title: TCL 55" Class 4K (2160P) Roku Smart LED TV (55S401)
product_meta.description: The S-Series 4K TCL Roku TV delivers stunning Ultra HD picture quality with four times the resolution of Full HD for enhanced clarity and detail, as well as the most streaming channels of any 4K TV. High dynamic range (HDR) technology delivers bright and accurate colors for a lifelike viewing experience. In addition, your favorite HD shows, movies, and sporting events are upscaled to near Ultra HD resolution with 4K Upscaling. The simple, intuitive interface allows seamless access to over 450,000 streaming movies and TV episodes, your cable box, Blu-ray player, gaming console, and other devices without flipping through inputs or complicated menus.
feature_bullets: Brand New in box. The product ships with all relevant accessories

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars44 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
